about.title: About Us
about.companyNameOrigin: The acronym "A&D" represents "Analog" and "Digital," reflecting our core technology of converting analog measurements into digital values.
about.business: Research, development, manufacturing, and sales of electronic measuring instruments, industrial weighing equipment, electronic balances, medical electronic devices, testing machines, and other electronic application equipment.
about.vision: Sensing the Future — Mastering Measurement, Supporting the World
about.visionDescription: A&D is committed to advancing analog and digital measurement technologies. We contribute to the development of industry and society through innovative products across weighing, measurement, medical, and automotive testing fields.
about.globalDescription: With operations spanning the Americas, Europe, Asia-Pacific, and Oceania, A&D serves customers in over 100 countries worldwide.
